General.Name: DLSI
General.Description: DLSI engages in the provision of employment solutions in France, Switzerland, Luxembourg, and Germany. The company represents a network of employment agencies. It offers its services under the DLSI, PEMSA, EMO DLSI, and TERCIO brands. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Forbach, France.
General.Address: Jean Eric Bousch Avenue, Forbach, France, 57603

1.Name: Mr. Jean-Marie  Nantern
1.Title: CFO, Head of Investor Relations & Member of the Supervisory Board
